content: I'm not sure what this will turn into, but for now I imagine this site having two main purposes: first, it serves as a portfolio for my technical projects. This site itself is a portfolio piece, and I plan to have a page devoted to showcasing some of my other tinkering. Secondly, there's this blog portion of the site. For this, my main thought here is that I'll discuss hikes and backpacking trips I've taken as well as any corresponding Youtube videos. It could, of course, turn into anything...
title: Welcome to the Blog
author: Daniel Gray
